TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrackBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现跟踪条控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a track bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现跟踪条控件的每个部分使用的操作系统当前视觉样式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render each part of a track bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 如果视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区在操作系统中启用了可视样式，此类中的方法将绘制跟踪条的当前视觉样式。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods in this class will draw the track bar with the current visual style. 否则，此类中的方法将引发。Otherwise, the methods in this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件绘制响应鼠标单击的水平跟踪条的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a horizontal track bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawBottomPointingThumb (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawBottomPointingThumb(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawBottomPointingThumb (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As TrackBarThumbState)
public: static void DrawBottomPointingThumb(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::TrackBarThumbState state);
static member DrawBottomPointingThumb : System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState -> unit

param.name: g
param.span: 用于绘制跟踪条滑块的 。

span.span: The used to draw the track bar slider.

param.name: bounds
param.span: 指定跟踪条滑块边界的 。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds of the track bar slider.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，指定跟踪条滑块的可视状态。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.

summary.span: 以视觉样式绘制一个指向下方的跟踪条滑块（又称滚动块）。

span.span: Draws a downward-pointing track bar slider (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证的值属性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`.

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证的值属性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`. 如果宽度或高度的边界矩形或计时周期数小于或等于零，或`g`是`null`，返回，而不呈现。If width or height of the bounding rectangle or the number of ticks is less than or equal to zero, or `g` is `null`, returns without rendering.
